cast.name: 鲁迪·罗德里格斯 Ruddy Rodríguez
华伦蒂娜·伦登 Valentina Rendón
阿方索·埃雷拉 Alfonso Herrera

writer.name: 华伦蒂娜·伦登 Valentina Rendón

introduction: The opening of a museum in honor of the Venezuelan heroes of WWII brings Venezzia down to memory lane. She recalls the arrival of Frank Moore, an American communications specialist whose orders were to protect oil tankers from the threat of U-Boats in the Caribbean and discover the identity of a Nazi spy amidst the Venezuelan Army, Frank meets Venezzia and falls in love but it’s an impossible love as she is unhappily married to Frank’s superior: Captain Salvatierra. Frank and Venezzia unleash their passion, their plans for a new life change as Frank is accused of being the spy.Script: Jörg Hiller, Valentina Rendón – Story: Haik Gazarian
